titles.title: To require the Federal Insurance Office to carry out a study on illegal steering and redlining in the insurance industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 7/10/2014--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Federal Insurance Office (in the Department of the Treasury) to study whether the insurance industry engages in the illegal practices of insurance steering or redlining, including an investigation of insurance products, pricing, promotions, and placement of services being offered to consumers in the United States.
